A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As of date\, to me\, this is the most interesting movie in the franchise. While the movie abandons the plot lines the Force Awakens lay before us\, it also gives us something new and different that we havent seen in this franchise so far. This is a Star Wars like no other you've seen\, and I recommend it highly if you're a fan of Star Wars and have wished for something new.
